alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; De Witt; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 8:57PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeWitt, Karnes, southwestern Gonzales, east central Atascosa, southern Lavaca and central Wilson Counties through 945 PM CST... At 857 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Gonzales to 11 miles north of Campbellton. Movement was east at 95 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuero, Yoakum, Kenedy, Karnes City, Poth, Yorktown, Stockdale, Kosciusko, Nixon, Runge, Falls City, Smiley, Nordheim, Pandora, Gillett, Cestohowa, Cheapside, Thomaston, Ezzell and Hochheim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Atascosa; De Witt; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
